document_data.caption: A bundle of daggerroot.
document_data.name: Daggerroot
document_data.mainbody: '''Daggerroot''', also known as the '''executioner's garnish''' was a species of [[herb]] found in blood-soaked areas of the [[Western Heartlands]].
document_data.Description: Daggerroot was known to flourish in spots where blood was spilled onto the ground. Executioner's garnish was often sold in bundles, each worth fifteen [[gold]] [[coin]]s.
document_data.Usages: When dried and burned, daggerroot plant ash was combined with special types of [[salt]] to create ''[[oil of accuracy]]''.
document_data.Notable Users: * Auntie [[Ethel]]: a [[hag]] in disguise who lived in the Western Heartlands ''circa'' [[1492 DR]].
